content: of the dpn and k2 ssk repeat this step until you have worked around the back of the heel to the last purl bump on the opposite side bind off center toe end next you ll work another i-cord continuously from bottom to top turn sock over on the bottom of the sock pick up 3 sts in the middle of the applied i-cord insert the l tip of the dpn into the first stitch in the column of purl bumps in the center slide these 4 end sts to the r side of the dpn and k2 ssk repeat this step until you have worked i-cord around the tip of the sock and along the top of the foot to top of the cuff bind off start continue working i-cord finishing weave in the 6 ends wash and block 5 appendix standard line by line instructions lower foot setup using jmco co 6 sts 3 sts on each needle work a half round
